MESSAGE.JP: ＨＲも終わり、放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After homeroom ended, we were free for the day.
MESSAGE.Translation: After homeroom ended, we were free for the day.

MESSAGE.JP: 生き返ったように、教室には話し声が飛び交い始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything in the classroom came back to life, and excited chatter filled the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything in the classroom came back to life, and excited chatter filled the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（えーと、来ヶ谷さんは…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hmm, where's Kurugaya-san...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hmm, where's Kurugaya-san...)

MESSAGE.JP: 教室を見回し、その姿を探した。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran my eyes across the classroom, looking for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran my eyes across the classroom, looking for her.

MESSAGE.JP: …もういない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But she was gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But she was gone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いきなり出遅れちゃったなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm too late...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm too late...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだよ、呼び出しとかもしてなかったのかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't tell me you didn't warn her beforehand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't tell me you didn't warn her beforehand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だってさ…なんかメール出すのとか、すっごい緊張しちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... I was just too nervous to text her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... I was just too nervous to text her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…送信ボタン押せなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Couldn't bring myself to press the send button.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Couldn't bring myself to press the send button.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「かっ…情けねぇ…それでもオレの宿敵か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hah... How pathetic... And you call yourself my arch nemesis?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hah... How pathetic... And you call yourself my arch nemesis?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いつから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Since when?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Since when?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やはりここは俺たちが出るしかないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I think we should give you a hand after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I think we should give you a hand after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だいじょうぶ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'll be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'll be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、直接連絡とってみるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll try to contact her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll try to contact her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I walked into the hall.
MESSAGE.Translation: I walked into the hall.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…えーと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を取り出し、来ヶ谷さんにコールしてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out my cellphone and dialed Kurugaya-san's number.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out my cellphone and dialed Kurugaya-san's number.

MESSAGE.JP: …繋がらない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But it didn't connect.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But it didn't connect.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Weird...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Weird...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こっちでもつながんねえな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I can't get through to her either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I can't get through to her either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「同じくだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Same here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Same here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「電源切れてるのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder if her battery died...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder if her battery died...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、とりあえず探してみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, guess I'll have to look for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, guess I'll have to look for her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃあ、こっちでも見かけたらおまえに連絡入れとくぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll let you know if I run into her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then, I'll let you know if I run into her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんなと別れ、校舎を歩き回ってみることに。
MESSAGE.EN: I left everyone else and started walking around the school, looking for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I left everyone else and started walking around the school, looking for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 自販機付近。
MESSAGE.EN: Near the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: Near the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: …いない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Not here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Not here.

MESSAGE.JP: 美術室。
MESSAGE.EN: Fine arts classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Fine arts classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …ここもいない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Not here either.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Not here either.

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンド。
MESSAGE.EN: Sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 部室。
MESSAGE.EN: Clubroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Clubroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …また、教室。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And back to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And back to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女子寮帰っちゃったのかなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe she returned to the dorm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe she returned to the dorm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「女子寮で携帯繋がらないと、連絡取りようないしなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But if her phone doesn't work, I have no way to contact her there...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But if her phone doesn't work, I have no way to contact her there...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰もいなくなった教室で、ひとり考える。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sitting alone in the classroom, contemplating what to do next.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sitting alone in the classroom, contemplating what to do next.

MESSAGE.JP: …明日にしようか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Maybe I should leave it for tomorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Maybe I should leave it for tomorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（いや…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(No...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(No...)

MESSAGE.JP: なんかもう、もやもやしてて、全然落ち着かない。
MESSAGE.EN: I won't be able to relax until I put an end to this anxiety and uncertainty.
MESSAGE.Translation: I won't be able to relax until I put an end to this anxiety and uncertainty.

MESSAGE.JP: 後回しにしたら、なんかもう前に踏み出せなくなるような気もする。
MESSAGE.EN: And I won't be able to move on if I keep putting it off.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I won't be able to move on if I keep putting it off.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか変だ、今の僕は。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is so mysterious.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is so mysterious.

MESSAGE.JP: 言いたくてしょうがないのに、言うのは怖い。
MESSAGE.EN: I want to speak these words so much, but I'm too scared to actually say them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I want to speak these words so much, but I'm too scared to actually say them.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（わけわかんないよ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I don't get it...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I don't get it...)

MESSAGE.JP: いつだって来ヶ谷さんには振り回されてばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was always the one taking the lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was always the one taking the lead.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ほんとに厄介な人だよなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What a troublesome person...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What a troublesome person...)

MESSAGE.JP: はあ、とひとつため息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、もう一度校内を探してみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to make one more round of the school.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to make one more round of the school.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、耳に入る、かすかなピアノの音。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But then, I heard the sound of piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But then, I heard the sound of piano.

MESSAGE.JP: 耳を澄ませてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I strained my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I strained my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: スピーカーから、耳に覚えのある曲が聞こえてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard a familiar melody coming from the speaker.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard a familiar melody coming from the speaker.

MESSAGE.JP: それは本当に小さな音だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound was very faint.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound was very faint.

MESSAGE.JP: …小さな音で、来ヶ谷さんのピアノの旋律が流れている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was quiet, but it was the sound of Kurugaya-san's piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was quiet, but it was the sound of Kurugaya-san's piano.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか、放送室か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, she must be in the broadcast room.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, she must be in the broadcast room.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は足をそっちに向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I started toward it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started toward it.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下を歩きながら、真人と謙吾のふたりに『多分見つかった』とメールを入れておいた。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way, I texted Masato and Kengo that I had probably found her.
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way, I texted Masato and Kengo that I had probably found her.

MESSAGE.JP: …窓の外、空には雲が掛かり、薄暗くなり始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There were clouds gathering up in the sky, and it was getting dark.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There were clouds gathering up in the sky, and it was getting dark.

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯をたたむ。
MESSAGE.EN: I closed my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I closed my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: その、ぱたんという音と同時に。
MESSAGE.EN: And with the sound of my cellphone being slammed shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: And with the sound of my cellphone being slammed shut.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（うわ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Wow...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Wow...)

MESSAGE.JP: めちゃくちゃ緊張してきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: Panic overcame me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Panic overcame me...

MESSAGE.JP: 放送室の前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I stood before the broadcast room door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stood before the broadcast room door.

MESSAGE.JP: 前向きになろうとは思うけど、やっぱり緊張するものは緊張するし、不安は拭い切れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though my intent was to face forward, it couldn't be helped that I was feeling panicky and nervous.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though my intent was to face forward, it couldn't be helped that I was feeling panicky and nervous.

MESSAGE.JP: …大体、告白前から絶対成功するって思えるほど、僕は自分に自信があるわけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Besides, I was never so self-confident to think that my confession would surely be successful.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Besides, I was never so self-confident to think that my confession would surely be successful.

MESSAGE.JP: むしろなんか、最近自分の情けない部分ばっかり見えてる気がするんだよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What's more, I felt like I'd been only demonstrating my incompetence recently...
MESSAGE.Translation: What's more, I felt like I'd been only demonstrating my incompetence recently...

MESSAGE.JP: でもまあ、ここまで来たら覚悟を決めて玉砕するしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: But after coming so far, I had to go through with it and accept rejection, should it come to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But after coming so far, I had to go through with it and accept rejection, should it come to it.

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなく、来ヶ谷さんと杉並さんのやり取りを思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, I remembered the conversation between Kurugaya-san and Suginami-san on that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, I remembered the conversation between Kurugaya-san and Suginami-san on that day.

MESSAGE.JP: あのときの来ヶ谷さんの言葉って、杉並さんは僕のことが好きだって言ってたんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: What Kurugaya-san said back then, did it mean Suginami-san had feelings for me?
MESSAGE.Translation: What Kurugaya-san said back then, did it mean Suginami-san had feelings for me?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…いや）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(No...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(No...)

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと考えたってしょうがないな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking about this now won't solve anything...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking about this now won't solve anything...

MESSAGE.JP: 人の心が見えない以上、そんな風に思えるのはよっぽどのいい男か、そうでなければよっぽどの馬鹿だと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: If you can't even understand someone's feelings but still assume they like you, you must be either a hell of a guy or a hell of a fool.
MESSAGE.Translation: If you can't even understand someone's feelings but still assume they like you, you must be either a hell of a guy or a hell of a fool.

MESSAGE.JP: …結局は、伝えないと前には進まない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No matter what, I can't move on until I tell her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No matter what, I can't move on until I tell her.

MESSAGE.JP: 聞かないと気持ちなんてわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: How can I know what she feels about me unless I ask her?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can I know what she feels about me unless I ask her?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷くと、放送室のドアに手を掛けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a firm nod and put my hand on the doorknob.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a firm nod and put my hand on the doorknob.

MESSAGE.JP: ピアノの演奏はもう終わっていたようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she'd already stopped playing piano.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she'd already stopped playing piano.

MESSAGE.JP: …放送室の中から物音は聞こえない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Not a sound was coming out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Not a sound was coming out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kurugaya-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声を掛けてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice broke the silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice broke the silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は中に入り、ドアを閉めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I stepped inside and closed the door behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stepped inside and closed the door behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ少年、こんなところまでどうした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, it's you, what brings you here, young man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh, it's you, what brings you here, young man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…ピアノの音が聞こえたからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I heard the piano.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I heard the piano.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここに来ヶ谷さんいるんだって思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I thought you would be here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I thought you would be here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fumu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか、うっかりしていた。この間からライン繋いだままだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that was careless of me. I forgot to unplug the cable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that was careless of me. I forgot to unplug the cable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、そのおかげで来ヶ谷さんがここにいるってわかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But thanks to that I found out that you're here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But thanks to that I found out that you're here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？　私を探していたのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? You were looking for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm? You were looking for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「言いたい事があったからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's something I wanted to tell you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's something I wanted to tell you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …動悸の間隔が加速していくのがわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...My heart was beating faster and faster in my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...My heart was beating faster and faster in my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あのさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Li-listen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Li-listen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、声まで上ずってしまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Even my voice was shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even my voice was shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…おかしな少年だな。言いたい事があるならはっきり言えばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You're so strange. If there's something you want to say, then come out and say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You're so strange. If there's something you want to say, then come out and say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「二十四時間いつでもなんでも聞いてやるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm ready to listen to you any time of the day or night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm ready to listen to you any time of the day or night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単にはっきり言えたら誰も苦労しないって…。
MESSAGE.EN: If only it was that easy to say these words...
MESSAGE.Translation: If only it was that easy to say these words...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、とりあえず落ち着いたらどうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, how about you calm down for starters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, how about you calm down for starters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それも無理だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That isn't possible either...
MESSAGE.Translation: That isn't possible either...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だ、だからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕、来ヶ谷さんが好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I like you, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I like you, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …言えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I did it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I did it.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、私も理樹君は好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I like you too, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah, I like you too, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「しかしそんなこと、改まって言うことか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But why would you need to announce something like that to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But why would you need to announce something like that to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見事に勘違いされてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was totally getting the wrong idea...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was totally getting the wrong idea...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だからそういうんじゃなくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I'm talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's not what I'm talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が言ってるのはさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What I'm saying is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What I'm saying is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、えーと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …めちゃくちゃ恥ずかしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I'm too embarrassed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I'm too embarrassed.

MESSAGE.JP: ていうか何でこんなこと説明しなきゃいけないんだっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, is this really something that should need to be spelled out?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, is this really something that should need to be spelled out?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その、多分恋してるって方の『好き』」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I mean, I probably like you in a romantic way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I mean, I probably like you in a romantic way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…理樹君が、私にか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You? Like me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You? Like me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ye-yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ye-yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ようやくわかってくれたみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Looks like that finally drove the point home to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Looks like that finally drove the point home to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは目を閉じ、じっと何かを考える。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her eyes and sank into thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her eyes and sank into thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 答えを待つその時間が、僕には永遠と思えるほどの長さだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I waited for her reply for what seemed like an eternity.
MESSAGE.Translation: I waited for her reply for what seemed like an eternity.

MESSAGE.JP: …動かない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't budge...
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't budge...

MESSAGE.JP: 時間が止まってしまったんじゃないか、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt like time had stopped entirely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt like time had stopped entirely.

MESSAGE.JP: …やがて来ヶ谷さんが目を開け、口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...At last, she raised her lids and spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...At last, she raised her lids and spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…花を摘んだことがあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...One day, I picked up some flowers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...One day, I picked up some flowers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「道端の小さな、綺麗な花だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They were beautiful flowers growing by the side of the road.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They were beautiful flowers growing by the side of the road.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私はそれを持ち帰った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And I took them back with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And I took them back with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…けれど、それはすぐに枯れて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...But before long they withered away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...But before long they withered away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ボロボロになってしまって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝They crumbled up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝They crumbled up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…たまらなく、後悔する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I regret it beyond words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I regret it beyond words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはこちらをみることなく、呟くように言葉を綴る。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept speaking in a low voice, not even once looking in my direction.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept speaking in a low voice, not even once looking in my direction.

MESSAGE.JP: …何のことだか、僕にはわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't understand what she was talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't understand what she was talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…聞かなかったことには出来ないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Can you pretend you never asked me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Can you pretend you never asked me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「多分、私には」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't think I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't think I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…誰の気持ちにも答える事が出来ないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...will ever be able to return anyone's feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...will ever be able to return anyone's feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …去り際、僕の肩にぽんと手を乗せる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She put her hand on my shoulder on her way out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She put her hand on my shoulder on her way out.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「降り始めたな。理樹君も早く戻ったほうがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝The rain's starting to fall, you should hurry back too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝The rain's starting to fall, you should hurry back too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言い残して、来ヶ谷さんは放送室を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: Without another word, she left.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without another word, she left.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（振られたのか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Did she turn me down...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Did she turn me down...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕ひとりになった放送室に、雨音が聞こえ始めてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: After being left alone in the room, I heard the sound of rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: After being left alone in the room, I heard the sound of rain.

MESSAGE.JP: 違う。雨はもっと前から降り始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: No. It had started long before that.
MESSAGE.Translation: No. It had started long before that.

MESSAGE.JP: …それは、気にしなければ聞こえない、ほんの小さな音のはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's just that the sound was so quiet I had paid no notice to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's just that the sound was so quiet I had paid no notice to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕にはやたら耳障りなほど、大きい音に思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: But now it felt maddeningly loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: But now it felt maddeningly loud.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…振られちゃったみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Guess I was turned down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Guess I was turned down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夜、僕と真人の部屋に集まった男三人を前に、そう切り出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I said to everyone after we'd gathered up in my room in the evening.
MESSAGE.Translation: I said to everyone after we'd gathered up in my room in the evening.

MESSAGE.JP: 複雑な表情をする面々。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone had a complex expression on their faces.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone had a complex expression on their faces.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけよくわかってない表情だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Only Rin didn't understand what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only Rin didn't understand what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあ、あれだよな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, what can I say...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, what can I say...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえはよくやったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You did well enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You did well enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぽん、と真人が僕の肩に手を乗せる。
MESSAGE.EN: He put his hand on my shoulder.
MESSAGE.Translation: He put his hand on my shoulder.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやまあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺は正直上手く行くと思ったんだがな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Frankly, I was convinced it'd go well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Frankly, I was convinced it'd go well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、難しいもんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's complicated.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's complicated.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まだ終わったわけじゃないと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't feel that it's over yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't feel that it's over yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sigh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sigh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「…振られたんだろう、もう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝...She turned you down, it's over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝...She turned you down, it's over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、流されただけで来ヶ谷さんの気持ちはちゃんと聞いてないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But she just evaded my question, I still haven't heard what she really feels.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But she just evaded my question, I still haven't heard what she really feels.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう少し頑張れる気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I'll keep at it for a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I'll keep at it for a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんなんだよ、おまえのその前向きっぷりは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's with that positive outlook of yours...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's with that positive outlook of yours...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、目いっぱい後ろ向きだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's probably a negative one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's probably a negative one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕、意外と諦め悪いみたいだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe I'm actually bad at giving up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe I'm actually bad at giving up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「振られたからって、すぐに気持ち切り替えられないってだけだよ、多分」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Essentially, it's just that I can't get over it so fast after being turned down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Essentially, it's just that I can't get over it so fast after being turned down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんか、聞いてるとどっちが前だかわからなくなってくるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The more I listen to you, the harder it is to tell if it really is positive or negative...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The more I listen to you, the harder it is to tell if it really is positive or negative...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあ、すぱっと切り替えられねえのは確かに男らしくはねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, if you're a man, you should be able to make a clean cut.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, if you're a man, you should be able to make a clean cut.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ははは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hahaha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hahaha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、そうなんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, he had a point.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, he had a point.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、だからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちゃんと口に出して伝えられただけでも、かなり前進したかなって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just being able to express my feelings to her is a big step for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just being able to express my feelings to her is a big step for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…なあ、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Listen, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Listen, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえがやる気になってるところに水をさすようであれなんだがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't want to be the one to pour cold water on you when you're being so enthusiastic, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't want to be the one to pour cold water on you when you're being so enthusiastic, but...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…もう、いいんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Isn't it enough already?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Isn't it enough already?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これ以上やっても、おまえが心に傷を負うだけの結果になるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Any more than this, and you're just going to end up hurting yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Any more than this, and you're just going to end up hurting yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そりゃ、好きだなんだの色恋沙汰に、そういう結果はどうやってもついて回るだろうが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I know, that's what it comes down to in any relationship, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I know, that's what it comes down to in any relationship, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だが、おまえが傷つく…そんな可能性がこれ以上高くなるなら、俺にはそれを手伝うことは出来ないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if there's a chance that you'll get hurt... I won't be able to help you with this any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if there's a chance that you'll get hurt... I won't be able to help you with this any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「来ヶ谷のことだ。今なら全部水に流して、今まで通りにやってくれると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If you pretend that nothing happened between you two now, you'll still be able to go back to the way you were before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If you pretend that nothing happened between you two now, you'll still be able to go back to the way you were before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことか、一瞬わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: It took some time for his point to get across to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took some time for his point to get across to me.

MESSAGE.JP: …それはつまり、諦めろってことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was telling me to give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was telling me to give up.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「たぶん、おまえにあいつの相手をするのは難しいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I think it'd be difficult for you to handle her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I think it'd be difficult for you to handle her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえも前に言ってただろ、来ヶ谷がリトルバスターズから離れるのがいやだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you say it before? That you don't want Kurugaya to distance herself from the Little Busters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you say it before? That you don't want Kurugaya to distance herself from the Little Busters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ヘタなことしたら、マジでそうなるかもしれないんだぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What if you do something stupid and it really happens?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What if you do something stupid and it really happens?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「気まずくなって、友達ですらいられなくなるってのもよく聞く話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If it gets awkward between you two, you won't be able to remain as friends.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝If it gets awkward between you two, you won't be able to remain as friends.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえ、そうなったら嫌だろう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You don't want that, do you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You don't want that, do you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺たちが…いや、俺がなんとかする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝We... No, I will do something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝We... No, I will do something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の前に謙吾が立ちふさがる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo stepped forward before Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo stepped forward before Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そんなことは無理だ。人の心は変えられない。わかってんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's impossible. You can't change someone's feelings. Don't you know that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's impossible. You can't change someone's feelings. Don't you know that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「でも俺たちがひとつになれば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But if we work together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But if we work together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえさっき、『俺が』と言い直したはずだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you say ❛I❜ just a second ago?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you say ❛I❜ just a second ago?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は言葉を失い、座り直す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was at a loss for words as he sat back down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was at a loss for words as he sat back down.

MESSAGE.JP: …恭介にそんなことを言われるとは思っていなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I never expected to hear that from Kyousuke.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I never expected to hear that from Kyousuke.

MESSAGE.JP: 返答に詰まる。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know how to answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know how to answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 冷静に考えてみると、確かに…恭介にしては、的外れなことばかりやっていたように思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking back on it... Everything Kyousuke'd been doing until now has been wide off the mark.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking back on it... Everything Kyousuke'd been doing until now has been wide off the mark.

MESSAGE.JP: それはつまり、最初から、この結末がわかっていて…。
MESSAGE.EN: Meaning that he knew it'd end like this from the beginning...
MESSAGE.Translation: Meaning that he knew it'd end like this from the beginning...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕があまり傷付かないように、さっきまでみたいに、みんなで軽く笑い飛ばせるように、動いていたんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But he didn't want me to get hurt, so we kept doing all those silly things together.
MESSAGE.Translation: But he didn't want me to get hurt, so we kept doing all those silly things together.

MESSAGE.JP: …他のふたりも何を言っていいかわからない様子で、ただ黙っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The other two didn't know what to say either and kept silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The other two didn't know what to say either and kept silent.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえがどうしてそこまで、来ヶ谷にこだわるようになったかはわからないけどな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know why you're so obsessed with Kurugaya...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know why you're so obsessed with Kurugaya...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえがそこまで本気だっていうのなら、ここから先はもう完全におまえひとりで責任を負う事になるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if she really means the world to you, you'll have to shoulder the responsibility yourself from here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if she really means the world to you, you'll have to shoulder the responsibility yourself from here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…わかるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you get it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Do you get it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真面目な顔で言われる。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked me with a serious look on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked me with a serious look on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: …責任。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Responsibility.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Responsibility.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕ひとりでそんなものを背負うことができるんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Can I really shoulder it myself?
MESSAGE.Translation: Can I really shoulder it myself?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それでもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I can't give up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I can't give up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんだけリスクがあってもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter how great the risk is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter how great the risk is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「好きなんだから、しょうがないんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I like her, and this can't be changed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I like her, and this can't be changed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介の言ってることって、こんだけ頑張って失敗したら、ってことでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What you're saying, Kyousuke, is that no matter how hard I try, I'll fail, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What you're saying, Kyousuke, is that no matter how hard I try, I'll fail, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、そうとも言えるが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, you can put it this way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, you can put it this way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「前向きになれってさ、そう教えてくれたのも来ヶ谷さんなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was Kurugaya-san who taught me to face forward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was Kurugaya-san who taught me to face forward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、もうちょっと頑張ってみる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's why, I won't give up just yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's why, I won't give up just yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は僕の言葉を聞くと、ひとつため息を吐いた。
MESSAGE.EN: After I finished, Kyousuke let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I finished, Kyousuke let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、焚きつけたのは俺らだしな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it was us who stirred you up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it was us who stirred you up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…うまくいくことを祈ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...I only hope it goes well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...I only hope it goes well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺たちには何もできない…頑張れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝There's nothing we can do... Good luck.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝There's nothing we can do... Good luck.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …こっからは、僕ひとりらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...From now on, I was on my own.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...From now on, I was on my own.

MESSAGE.JP: うまくなんて、行くんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Is it really going to work out?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it really going to work out?

MESSAGE.JP: でもまあ、そんなのがわかるなら、誰も恋愛で悩むことなんてない。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, if it was so simple no one would have to struggle with love.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, if it was so simple no one would have to struggle with love.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、僕にはうまくいくように努力する以外にはないみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: At the end of the day I could only give it my best shot and pray for success...
MESSAGE.Translation: At the end of the day I could only give it my best shot and pray for success...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにをそんなに深刻になってるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Why are you so serious about this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Why are you so serious about this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それが…恋をするってことさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝That's what... it means to be in love.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝That's what... it means to be in love.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 外をみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked outside.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨は、ようやく上がったみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The rain had finally let up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rain had finally let up.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾は朝食の場に姿を見せなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo didn't show up to the cafeteria for breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo didn't show up to the cafeteria for breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしたんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder what happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder what happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今までこっちに付き合ってたぶんを取り戻すってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝He's probably making up for all the time he spent with us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝He's probably making up for all the time he spent with us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何を？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そりゃ剣道に決まってるだろ。新人戦も控えてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝About kendo, what else. The newcomers competition is around the corner.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝About kendo, what else. The newcomers competition is around the corner.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I see...
MESSAGE.Translation: I see...

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に関しては、今まで一緒に居てくれたほうが不思議なぐらいだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's surprising that he'd actually spent so much time with us during the past few days.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's surprising that he'd actually spent so much time with us during the past few days.

MESSAGE.JP: 悪いことしたかな。
MESSAGE.EN: I started feeling guilty.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started feeling guilty.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、あいつなら簡単に取り戻してしまうだろうさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's Kengo, I'm sure he'll make up for it instantly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, it's Kengo, I'm sure he'll make up for it instantly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の不安を察したように恭介が言った。
MESSAGE.EN: He spoke as though he knew my worries.
MESSAGE.Translation: He spoke as though he knew my worries.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…やっぱり、無理なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I guess it's impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I guess it's impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それはやってみないとわからないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You never know unless you try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You never know unless you try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「少なくとも、おまえにその自信がないなら、ここでやめといたほうがいいと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But if you don't think it's possible yourself, this is where you should back down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But if you don't think it's possible yourself, this is where you should back down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ確かに、これまでの事を振り返ってみると、結局はみんなに寄りかかって、ひとりで息巻いてただけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It's true that I've been relying on them so far and could get nothing done right by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's true that I've been relying on them so far and could get nothing done right by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: …失敗しても、みんなに慰めてもらえる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even if I failed, they'd be there to cheer me up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even if I failed, they'd be there to cheer me up.

MESSAGE.JP: 言い換えれば、失敗したときの責任は、僕だけが背負うものではないということ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, if I failed, I'd not be the only one taking the responsibility.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, if I failed, I'd not be the only one taking the responsibility.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風に甘えていられるから、僕はただ動けてただけなんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe such wishful thinking was what had kept me going until now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe such wishful thinking was what had kept me going until now.

MESSAGE.JP: …前向きになるって、どんなことなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What does it mean to live facing forward?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What does it mean to live facing forward?

MESSAGE.JP: 段々、そのことすら見失ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was gradually losing sight of this concept.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was gradually losing sight of this concept.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、もう一度じっくり考えてみろよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, think it over one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, think it over one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…もういいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Are you done?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Are you done?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、何がさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Done what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Done what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「シリアスすぎて口出しできねぇんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝With this serious talk, I felt like I shouldn't butt in...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝With this serious talk, I felt like I shouldn't butt in...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんかよぉ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You know what.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You know what.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「もっとこう、こういうのって楽しいもんじゃねえのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't you think stuff like this is fun enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't you think stuff like this is fun enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「つい昨日までは少なくともそうだっただろうが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm sure it's been fun until yesterday, at least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm sure it's been fun until yesterday, at least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、結構悩んでたけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, it's been pretty tough on me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, it's been pretty tough on me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まあ、俺にはよくわからんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well, I don't really get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well, I don't really get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕もよくわかんなくなってきた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really get it anymore, myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really get it anymore, myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレなんて最初っからわかんねえよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I never got it to begin with...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I never got it to begin with...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕らが三人で頭を抱えているのを、恭介は黙って見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...While we were deep in thought, Kyousuke watched us silently.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...While we were deep in thought, Kyousuke watched us silently.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴だけが、いつもと変わらず猫とじゃれていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Only Rin was playing with a cat, just like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only Rin was playing with a cat, just like always.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局そのあとはまともな話も出来ず、夜は更けていった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, we couldn't talk seriously about anything, and before we knew it the evening was over.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, we couldn't talk seriously about anything, and before we knew it the evening was over.

MESSAGE.JP: 翌日。
MESSAGE.EN: The following day...
MESSAGE.Translation: The following day...

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み、放送室へ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch, I headed over to the broadcast room.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch, I headed over to the broadcast room.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…なんだ、また来たのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Oh, you're here again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Oh, you're here again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一緒にご飯でも食べようかと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought it'd be nice to eat lunch here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought it'd be nice to eat lunch here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それは構わんが、そっちの机でな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't mind, but use the desk over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't mind, but use the desk over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、いつも通りの会話。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Our conversation went on the way it always did.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Our conversation went on the way it always did.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さん的には、やっぱりこれまでの事は、本当になかった事になっているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess she's acting like nothing happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess she's acting like nothing happened.

MESSAGE.JP: だったらまあ、それでいいんじゃないかとも思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, why don't I do the same?
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, why don't I do the same?

MESSAGE.JP: それこそみんなでいろいろ騒ぎながら、段々前へ進んでいくって。
MESSAGE.EN: This way, we'll be able to keep fooling around together with everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: This way, we'll be able to keep fooling around together with everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなのが、一番楽しい恋愛のかたちなんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Isn't it the most fun way a relationship can stand?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Isn't it the most fun way a relationship can stand?

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし理樹君、今日のタイトルコールを頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, Riki-kun, you take care of today's announcement.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Okay, Riki-kun, you take care of today's announcement.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「タイトルコールって何さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What should I announce...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What should I announce...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「前に言っていただろう。もっと普通のラジオっぽく、軽いトークを交えてだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's like you said before. Some light chatter like on radio programs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's like you said before. Some light chatter like on radio programs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、待ってよ、僕も参加するのそれ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, do I have to take part in it!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, do I have to take part in it!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「言い出しっぺが何を言う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Wasn't it your idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Wasn't it your idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんなこと言ったってさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it was, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it was, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「こういうものにアシスタントは付き物だろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You can't do this sort of thing without an assistant.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You can't do this sort of thing without an assistant.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…どうせ誰も聴いちゃいないさ。馬鹿連中には伝えてもいいかもしれないがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...No one is going to listen to it anyway. So maybe you should let those idiots know too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...No one is going to listen to it anyway. So maybe you should let those idiots know too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「せっかくだ、バスターズの面々全員をゲストとして毎週招くのも面白そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It should be fun to have someone from the Little Busters as a guest every week.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It should be fun to have someone from the Little Busters as a guest every week.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「校内放送、完全に私物化してるよねそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're using the school's broadcast system as you please...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're using the school's broadcast system as you please...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんのムチャクチャな言動に振り回される。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She always makes me play a part in her crazy plans.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She always makes me play a part in her crazy plans.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな風に過ごす時間は、きっと楽しい。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure it's going to be a lot of fun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure it's going to be a lot of fun.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああもう、何でも付き合うよ、もう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Geez, okay, you can count me in...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Geez, okay, you can count me in...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もしも、『今』なんていう時間がここにあって、『今』しか出来ないことがあるとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: Suppose that there are things that you can only do in the ❛now.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Suppose that there are things that you can only do in the ❛now.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …こうしているどうでもいい時間だって、それはすごくかけがえのないものだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then even when we're just fooling around, it's an irreplaceable experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then even when we're just fooling around, it's an irreplaceable experience.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむうむ、素直な少年は好きだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, I like it when young men are honest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh, I like it when young men are honest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなのがいつまでも続くって、
MESSAGE.EN: If only such times could continue forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only such times could continue forever.

MESSAGE.JP: それはとても幸せなことなんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: That would be perfect happiness.
MESSAGE.Translation: That would be perfect happiness.

MESSAGE.JP: …だからぼくは、
MESSAGE.EN: That's why...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why...

MESSAGE.JP: それがいつまでも続いていけばいいと、
MESSAGE.EN: I thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought...

MESSAGE.JP: そう、
MESSAGE.EN: ...that...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...that...

MESSAGE.JP: おもった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...such times should never end.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...such times should never end.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「お休み、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Good night, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Good night, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: また、
MESSAGE.EN: Then,
MESSAGE.Translation: Then,

MESSAGE.JP: いつか。
MESSAGE.EN: one day,
MESSAGE.Translation: one day,

MESSAGE.JP: …いつまでも。
MESSAGE.EN: ...forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み、放送室。
MESSAGE.EN: During lunch, in the broadcast room.
MESSAGE.Translation: During lunch, in the broadcast room.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…また来たのか、理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...So, you're here again, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...So, you're here again, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は昼食の入ったビニール袋を机の上に載せると、来ヶ谷さんの座る席の対面に腰を落ち着けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I set the plastic bag containing my lunch on the desk and seated myself across from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set the plastic bag containing my lunch on the desk and seated myself across from her.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Uh-huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「せっかくだからまた曲紹介でもやっていくか、少年」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Since you're here anyway, why don't you announce a song.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Since you're here anyway, why don't you announce a song.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、遠慮しておく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I don't want to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I don't want to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうか、残念だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's a shame.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I see, that's a shame.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そんな事しに来たんじゃないからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...That's not what I'm here for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...That's not what I'm here for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、また」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What is it this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What is it this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちゃんと返事を聞きたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I want to hear your answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I want to hear your answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それまで多分、諦めきれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think I'll give up until then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think I'll give up until then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはそのまま黙ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She said nothing to that.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said nothing to that.

MESSAGE.JP: また、長い間。
MESSAGE.EN: I was waiting for a long time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was waiting for a long time.

MESSAGE.JP: …でも、不思議と前ほどには緊張していない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But strangely enough, I didn't feel nervous.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But strangely enough, I didn't feel nervous.

MESSAGE.JP: 結構人間って、簡単に『慣れる』ものなんだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: It doesn't take long for people to get used to something, it seems.
MESSAGE.Translation: It doesn't take long for people to get used to something, it seems.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が今、変に覚悟を決めてしまってる、っていうのもあるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or perhaps I was just steeled for any outcome now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or perhaps I was just steeled for any outcome now.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、それが僕の決めた『前向き』ってことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was because I had decided to ❛face forward.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It was because I had decided to ❛face forward.❜

MESSAGE.JP: やがて、来ヶ谷さんが口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally she spoke.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally she spoke.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「返事はしたつもりだったが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think I gave you my answer already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think I gave you my answer already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…理由を聞かせて欲しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I want to know the reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I want to know the reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「言ったとおりだ。私は誰の気持ちにも答えることは出来ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's as I said. I can't return anyone's feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's as I said. I can't return anyone's feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が聞きたいのはそういうことじゃなくてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's not what I want to hear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's not what I want to hear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もっと単純なことなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What I want to hear is a lot simpler.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What I want to hear is a lot simpler.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕のことが好きか、嫌いか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you like me, or do you not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you like me, or do you not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そんな二元論しかないのか、理樹君の質問は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Are there only two answers to your question?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Are there only two answers to your question?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…そのふたつ、どっちかの答えが聞きたいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It has to be one of the two.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It has to be one of the two.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「あんまり、私を困らせないでくれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're putting me in a difficult position...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're putting me in a difficult position...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん、わかってるんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, I know that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, I know that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度、ため息。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミほど私の調子を狂わせた人間はいない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No one makes me lose my composure like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No one makes me lose my composure like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大体、私だぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, it's me, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Besides, it's me, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何で私なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Why does it have to be me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Why does it have to be me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でとかじゃないと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think it matters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think it matters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう一回言うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let me say it one more time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let me say it one more time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は、来ヶ谷さんが好きなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I like you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: ...Huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Huh?

MESSAGE.JP: 顔を伏せたまま、来ヶ谷さんは早足で放送室を出て行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san cast down her eyes and darted out of the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san cast down her eyes and darted out of the room.

MESSAGE.JP: な、なんだったんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Wh-what was that about...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wh-what was that about...

MESSAGE.JP: と、機材の電源が入りっ放しだということに気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed that the mic was still plugged in.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed that the mic was still plugged in.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（うわ、マイク入りっぱなしじゃん…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Wow, it was on the entire time...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Wow, it was on the entire time...)

MESSAGE.JP: でも、どうせ誰も聴いてないんだろうな。
MESSAGE.EN: But I don't suppose anyone was listening anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I don't suppose anyone was listening anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: いっそこれに向かって、全力で叫んでみたらスッキリするかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I would've felt better if I had actually broadcast my feelings here.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I would've felt better if I had actually broadcast my feelings here.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（やっぱ振られるのかなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Is she really going to turn me down...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Is she really going to turn me down...)

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled Kyousuke's words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled Kyousuke's words.

MESSAGE.JP: せめて返事がもらえればなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I need to at least get an answer from her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I need to at least get an answer from her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…僕には難しい、か）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Is this too much for me to handle?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Is this too much for me to handle?)

MESSAGE.JP: 実際、来ヶ谷さんのこと、わからないことだらけだし。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san was still full of mysteries to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san was still full of mysteries to me.

MESSAGE.JP: …そもそも、恋愛沙汰なんて初めてな僕が、『上手く』やれるはずもない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had zero experience with romance anyway, so I didn't know how to handle the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had zero experience with romance anyway, so I didn't know how to handle the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: But...
MESSAGE.Translation: But...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…さっきの来ヶ谷さん）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...That look on her face...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...That look on her face...)

MESSAGE.JP: あんな顔を見たのは初めてだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd never seen her make that face before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd never seen her make that face before.

MESSAGE.JP: …でも、あんなふうにする来ヶ谷さんは。
MESSAGE.EN: When she's like that...
MESSAGE.Translation: When she's like that...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…可愛かった、よなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She's so cute...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She's so cute...)

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、そういう知らない来ヶ谷さんをみるたびに、どんどんそう思うようになってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time I witnessed another side of her personality I wasn't familiar with, I ended up thinking this way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time I witnessed another side of her personality I wasn't familiar with, I ended up thinking this way.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初はただの憧れだったのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: At first, I had only looked up to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first, I had only looked up to her.

MESSAGE.JP: …カッコいいなって。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I simply thought she was cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I simply thought she was cool.

MESSAGE.JP: 今は、知るたびに可愛いって気持ちが強くなってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: But now I found myself thinking more and more that she was cute.
MESSAGE.Translation: But now I found myself thinking more and more that she was cute.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…やっぱりなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...It's like this, after all.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...It's like this, after all.)

MESSAGE.JP: そう思っちゃうと、後になんて引けないよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That I'm thinking like this means there's no going back for me...
MESSAGE.Translation: That I'm thinking like this means there's no going back for me...

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単に諦められるようだったら、きっと好きになんてならないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: If it had really been that easy to give up, it would have meant I wasn't in love in the first place.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it had really been that easy to give up, it would have meant I wasn't in love in the first place.

MESSAGE.JP: とにかく、うやむやにしちゃうのだけは絶対に嫌だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyhow, I need to set things straight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyhow, I need to set things straight.

MESSAGE.JP: 椅子の背もたれに体を預けて、窓の外を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I rested myself on the chair and looked out the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rested myself on the chair and looked out the window.

MESSAGE.JP: …曇り空だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was cloudy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was cloudy.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、まぶしすぎる太陽に文句を言わなくてすむだけ、ましな天候なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I should be grateful that I don't have to curse the blindingly bright sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I should be grateful that I don't have to curse the blindingly bright sky.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ああもう、何バカなことばっかり考えてんだろ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(God, what am I thinking...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(God, what am I thinking...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 僕ははあと息を吐いて、機材の電源を切り、放送室を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out another sigh, unplugged the cable and left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out another sigh, unplugged the cable and left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: もやもやしたまま、夜になる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was evening again, and I still hadn't figured out anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was evening again, and I still hadn't figured out anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 落ち着きやしない。
MESSAGE.EN: I just can't calm down.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just can't calm down.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと外行ってくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん、ああ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mm, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mm, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 寝っ転がって筋トレをしている真人に一言残し、外に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I warned Masato, who was lying on the floor doing his work-out, and went outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: I warned Masato, who was lying on the floor doing his work-out, and went outside.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…はあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 空を見上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked up at the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked up at the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 雲が流れていく。だんだん、空が狭くなっていく気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: The clouds were gathering, and I felt like the sky was shrinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: The clouds were gathering, and I felt like the sky was shrinking.

MESSAGE.JP: 明日は雨だろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is it going to rain tomorrow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it going to rain tomorrow?

MESSAGE.JP: …なんで、晴れないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why won't the sky clear up?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why won't the sky clear up?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか、梅雨入りだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The rainy season is about to start.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rainy season is about to start.

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく続くんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: We're going to be having them for a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: We're going to be having them for a while...

MESSAGE.JP: …晴れない日が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Rainy days.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Rainy days.

MESSAGE.JP: なんとなくぶらぶらしているうちに、中庭にまで来てしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was strolling aimlessly along, and then found myself in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was strolling aimlessly along, and then found myself in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、最近やってないな、お茶会。
MESSAGE.EN: We haven't had tea together for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: We haven't had tea together for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…なんか飲もうかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...I should get something to drink.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...I should get something to drink.)

MESSAGE.JP: 自販機に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: I headed to the vending machine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I headed to the vending machine.

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、もうすぐ梅雨だってのに、なんだかまだ肌寒い気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: The rainy season is about to start, but it still feels chilly.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rainy season is about to start, but it still feels chilly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（梅雨ってのは、もっとじめじめしててさ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It's going to be more damp during the rainy season...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It's going to be more damp during the rainy season...)

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（もっと気分が悪くて…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(It's going to be even more unpleasant...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(It's going to be even more unpleasant...)

MESSAGE.JP: …そんな季節なら、来ないほうがいい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Why do we even need a season like that?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Why do we even need a season like that?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sigh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気分ばっかりじめじめしてるなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: My feelings were damp too...
MESSAGE.Translation: My feelings were damp too...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、ホットコーヒーを飲むことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: So I decided to get some hot coffee.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I decided to get some hot coffee.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの来ヶ谷さんと同じ、砂糖もミルクも入れない、ブラックコーヒー。
MESSAGE.EN: Black with no sugar, the way Kurugaya-san always drank it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Black with no sugar, the way Kurugaya-san always drank it.

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭の片隅、ガラクタのテーブルと椅子に腰掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I sat down on one of the worn out stools in the corner of the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sat down on one of the worn out stools in the corner of the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…苦いなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's bitter.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's bitter.❞

MESSAGE.JP: コーヒーが苦く感じるってのは、まだまだ自分が子供だってことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The coffee tasted bitter to me. I felt that was proof that I was still a kid.
MESSAGE.Translation: The coffee tasted bitter to me. I felt that was proof that I was still a kid.

MESSAGE.JP: …ことさら、苦く感じた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This thought made it taste even more bitter.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This thought made it taste even more bitter.

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「理樹君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声に振り向く。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned to the voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned to the voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…やあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さん…あ、あちちっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san... Ah, oww.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kurugaya-san... Ah, oww.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …コーヒーをこぼして、手に掛けてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I spilled coffee on my hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I spilled coffee on my hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そんなに驚くことはないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No need to be so surprised.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No need to be so surprised.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、何でここに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why are you here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why are you here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「さあ、何でだろうな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I wonder why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I wonder why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは静かに席に着く。
MESSAGE.EN: She quietly seated herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She quietly seated herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だいたい、話すこともないのに、なぜ私はキミに声を掛けたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't even have anything to talk to you about, why did I stop you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't even have anything to talk to you about, why did I stop you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「もう、さっぱりわからん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I just don't get it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I just don't get it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、僕に聞かれてもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't look at me, I don't know either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't look at me, I don't know either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「原因は間違いなくキミだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But there's no question that you're the main cause.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But there's no question that you're the main cause.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…キミが私の調子を狂わせるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I always lose my composure because of you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I always lose my composure because of you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: はあ、とひとつため息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She sighed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sighed.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…昨日もよく眠れなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...I didn't sleep well yesterday.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...I didn't sleep well yesterday.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「変に浮かれて、キミの言葉ばかりが頭に響く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know why I was so buoyant, I couldn't get your words out of my head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't know why I was so buoyant, I couldn't get your words out of my head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「くそ、何なんだキミはっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Damn, what's wrong with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Damn, what's wrong with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや…怒らないでよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-wait... Don't get mad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-wait... Don't get mad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなに気にしててくれたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Was she that concerned about it?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Was she that concerned about it?

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんはふう、と息をひとつ吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out another sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out another sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…キミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私なんかの、どこがいいんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What's so great about me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What's so great about me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…どこだろう…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm... I don't know...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... I don't know...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「理由も無しに人を好きになるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need a reason to fall in love with someone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need a reason to fall in love with someone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さ、さぁ…もしかしたら僕がおかしいだけかもしれないけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... Maybe I'm just strange like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... Maybe I'm just strange like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなもんなんじゃないかって思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think this is quite normal, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think this is quite normal, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、きっかけはあったかも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I think I know when it started, at least...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I think I know when it started, at least...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …最初は、カッコいいって思ったから。
MESSAGE.EN: ...At first, it was because I thought she was cool.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...At first, it was because I thought she was cool.

MESSAGE.JP: それから、だんだんとそれが『好き』ってことなんだと、そう思うようになった。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I gradually found myself liking her more and more, until I ended up where I am now.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I gradually found myself liking her more and more, until I ended up where I am now.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミの気持ちは…さっぱり解らん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I don't understand your feelings...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I don't understand your feelings...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「きっと、私の不幸はそういう感情に触れることなく過ごしてきたことなのだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think my tragedy is that I've never had this feeling before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think my tragedy is that I've never had this feeling before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミたちと会うまで、自分が不幸であることにすら気付けなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Before I met you guys, I didn't even realize how unfortunate I was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Before I met you guys, I didn't even realize how unfortunate I was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なにが楽しくて、なにがつまらないことなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I didn't know what was fun and what was boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I didn't know what was fun and what was boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私はなんにも知らなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I didn't know a thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I didn't know a thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…恋してるだとか、好きだとか、もな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Not even what it is to be in love, or to like someone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Not even what it is to be in love, or to like someone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今は…少し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Now... A little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Now... A little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほんの少しだけ、かもしれないが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Maybe just a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Maybe just a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今は、解る気がする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I think I understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I think I understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミの言葉が、嬉しかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I was happy to hear your words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I was happy to hear your words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それは、きっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That must mean that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That must mean that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…キミが思ってることと、同じなんだって、ことだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...we feel the same way about each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...we feel the same way about each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お互い、黙ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither of us said a word.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither of us said a word.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、鼻先にひとつ雫が。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And then I felt a drop of water on my nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And then I felt a drop of water on my nose.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨が降り始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The rain was starting to fall down.
MESSAGE.Translation: The rain was starting to fall down.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「以上、私の偽らざる気持ちだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝These are my true feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝These are my true feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの口調だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke in her usual tone.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke in her usual tone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…来ヶ谷さん、顔真っ赤」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're blushing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're blushing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Wha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Wha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もちろんその返事をもらえたことが嬉しいんだけど、それ以上にこんな来ヶ谷さんを見ていることが、おかしかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was happy to hear her answer, but she just looked so funny right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was happy to hear her answer, but she just looked so funny right now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あははっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah-hahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah-hahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…なんなんだ、キミは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...What's with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...What's with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…嬉しくてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…すっごい嬉しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm really happy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I'm really happy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…嬉しい、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You're happy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You're happy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「雨、降ってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It's starting to rain.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It's starting to rain.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…また理樹君が風邪を引いたら困るな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...It'd be bad if you caught a cold again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...It'd be bad if you caught a cold again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、恋人の見舞いに行くというのもまた面白いものではあるが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it'd be fun to check up on my sick boyfriend again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, it'd be fun to check up on my sick boyfriend again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こ、恋人かぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-your boyfriend...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-your boyfriend...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、未知の響きだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't used to hearing that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't used to hearing that...

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…違うのか？　私はそうだと思ったんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Am I mistaken? I was under the impression it was like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Am I mistaken? I was under the impression it was like that.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, well, if it's okay with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, well, if it's okay with you.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Do I have to spell it out for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Do I have to spell it out for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミと私は恋人同士。それでいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝We're now a couple. I hope it's clear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝We're now a couple. I hope it's clear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんも慣れない響きのようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like she wasn't used to saying this either.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like she wasn't used to saying this either.

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「どうしたらいいんだ、こういうときは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What should I do in this situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What should I do in this situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「別に…普通でいいと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nothing... Just be yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nothing... Just be yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それもそうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ…そういうわけだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well... That's about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well... That's about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…戻る？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Are you going back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Are you going back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…一つ、約束事をしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Promise me one thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Promise me one thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「雨の日は、外に遊びに行くのはやめよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You mustn't go outside when it rains.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You mustn't go outside when it rains.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、それは普通のことだと思うけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, that didn't sound like anything out of the ordinary.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, that didn't sound like anything out of the ordinary.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんは意外と心配性なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe she's actually quite the unexpected worrywart.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe she's actually quite the unexpected worrywart.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、今度晴れた日に、喫茶店に行こう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, when it's sunny let's go to the cafe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, when it's sunny let's go to the cafe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「喫茶店？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Cafe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Cafe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こないだ行ったとこがいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The one we went to the other day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The one we went to the other day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「晴れた日に、な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But only when it's sunny.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But only when it's sunny.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつの約束を取り付け、僕らはそれぞれの部屋に戻ることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: We made a promise to each other, and after that returned to our respective rooms.
MESSAGE.Translation: We made a promise to each other, and after that returned to our respective rooms.

MESSAGE.JP: 自室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I got back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ？　ニヤニヤしやがって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What happened? You're grinning like crazy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What happened? You're grinning like crazy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんか嬉しいことでもあったかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Did something good happen?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Did something good happen?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、嬉しそう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, do I look that happy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, do I look that happy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、めちゃくちゃ晴れ晴れとした顔してやがるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, you're totally smiling from ear to ear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, you're totally smiling from ear to ear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, okay...❞

MESSAGE.EN: And then...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then...

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯の着信が。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a call.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a call.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ？　え？　彼女からか？　すげーな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's that? Is that from your girlfriend? Awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's that? Is that from your girlfriend? Awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや前も同じ早とちりしてたよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You jumped to the same conclusion before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You jumped to the same conclusion before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …来ヶ谷さんからだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was from Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was from Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ…ごめん、早とちりじゃないかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... Sorry, you're actually right on the money this time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... Sorry, you're actually right on the money this time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だろ？　すげーなオレ。わかったんだよ、こう筋肉がびびっとな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝See? Aren't I awesome. I just knew it when I had this tingling feeling in my muscles...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝See? Aren't I awesome. I just knew it when I had this tingling feeling in my muscles...❞

MESSAGE.JP: よくわからないことを言ってるが、とりあえず出ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea what he was talking about, so I just answered the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea what he was talking about, so I just answered the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@『何をいきなり謝ってるんだ、キミは』
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@[What are you apologizing for?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@[What are you apologizing for?]

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「何いいぃぃぃいいぃぃーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wait, whaaat!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wait, whaaat!?❞
